column1: Local Foods////They have a small menu of gourmet sandwiches.  I got the shrimp and crab sandwich and the duck confit sandwich.  Each sandwich comes with 2 sides.  I have to say while both sandwiches were good the duck confit one was amazing!! It has duck
column4: and cranberry preserve.  Oh my gosh just really amazing.  The seafood one was also good
column5: a lot of lump REAL crab and a delicious green sauce.  For the sides we had homemade potato chips
column8: and cole slaw.  The kale salad was the real winner for me
column9: golden raisins and truffles made it amazing.  Really enjoyed the Asian cole slaw as well.  The potato chips and potato salad were just okay.
